hotkey.title: Hotkey
hotkey.description: Simulate a combination of keys to invoke a hotkey shortcut.
hotkey.label: Hotkey

input.description_1: Click 'Capture' and press the key combination you want to trigger when the key is pressed.
Select the page to which you want to navigate.

url.title: URL
url.description: Open a URL in your default browser.
url.label: Open link

input.description_1: Enter the URL you want to open when the button is pressed.

executable.title: Run executable
executable.description: Open an app installed on your computer.
executable.label: Open app

input.description_1: Select the executable file you want to run when the button is pressed.

sound.title: Play sound
sound.label: Play sound
sound.description: Allows playing a .mp3 or .wav file every time the button is pressed.

input.description_1: Select the file you want to play when you press the button.
